meanings.definition: A strap that goes under the chin to secure a hat or helmet in place.
meanings.sent1: The football player fastened his helmet with sturdy chinstraps.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the chinstraps on her sun hat before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy tried to chew on the chinstraps of the bike helmet.
meanings.sent4: The chinstraps of responsibility kept his thoughts in place.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut double-checked the chinstraps on his helmet before the spacewalk.

meanings.definition: A strap that goes under the chin to secure a mask or other protective gear in place.
meanings.sent1: The firefighter ensured his oxygen mask was tight with the chinstraps.
meanings.sent2: The goalie adjusted the chinstraps of his mask before the game.
meanings.sent3: The ninja's chinstraps were so snug, he couldn't even speak properly.
meanings.sent4: The chinstraps of caution held back his impulsive actions.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's life depended on the secure chinstraps of his helmet.
